text:
For years, U.S. researchers have been collaborating with the Wuhan Institute of Virology on a bat research project — which experts say is vital to preventing the next major coronavirus outbreak.

Now, the Trump administration has abruptly cut its funding. https://t.co/LVsyswcOvb
